name: Band of Veiled Shadows
tooltip:
Band of Veiled ShadowsLevel 60

Bring 1 Qiraji Ceremonial Ring, 2 Onyx Idols, 5 Stone Scarabs and 5 Crystal Scarabs to Windcaller Yessendra in Silithus.  You must also attain Honored reputation with Cenarion Circle to complete this quest.

Requirements:
- Qiraji Ceremonial Ring
- Onyx Idol x 2
- Stone Scarab x 5
- Crystal Scarab x 5
- Cenarion Circle:
